name: Station Iuvara - Demo
description:
Survive as an astronaut in this virtual reality adventure!

You are alone in the Iuvara Base on Oberon, the far away moon of Uranus.
The corporation you work for has sent you to recover the remains of an old satellite previously sent there to investigate a strange signal.

Requires the Oculus Rift DK2 and Xbox One controller.
Click below to download the demo version.

Feel free to use the following email address for suggestions or report an issue.

telamontgdvr@gmail.com
